name: politico
text:

text: Coronavirus outbreaks in schools are wrecking Trump's plans for a return to normal. Thousands of students and teachers are getting sick, triggering mass quarantines, campus closures and last-minute switches to online learning. https://t.co/4KBkA3qit7

name: politico
text:
